participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: empathetic and dedicated, always striving to help others.
participant_1.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: family-oriented and hardworking, with a great sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i have three children. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i'm a plumber.

content.text: I'm a plumber. What do you do?
